amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to issue a final rule on cost-sharing for animal and plant health emergency programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to issue a final rule in Docket No. 02-06201, "Cost-sharing for Animal and Plant Health Emergency Programs".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
